text: Bruno Lafont (born 8 June 1956) is the chairman and former CEO of Lafarge.Bruno Lafont, ex-PDG de Lafarge : «Les autorités françaises nous ont encouragés à maintenir nos activités en Syrie» He graduated from HEC Paris in 1977.Bruno Lafont He is also board member of Électricité de France and ArcelorMittal.Le patron de LafargeHolcim quitte le groupe == References == Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of HEC Paris Category:Businesspeople from Boulogne-Billancourt
title: Bruno Lafont
